languages.text: "Все по-прежнему идет по плану, Вил'Руолдо. Неумирающий прошептал твое имя — и воля Его будет исполнена уже очень скоро".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Все по-прежнему идет по плану, Вил'Руолдо, — ибо сам Неумирающий запланировал твою смерть".
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."
languages.original_text: "Все по-прежнему идет по плану, Вил'Руолдо. Неумирающий прошептал твое имя — и воля Его будет исполнена уже очень скоро".

traits.locale_text: "The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."
"The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."
"The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."
"The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."
"The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."
"The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."

languages.text: "Der Plan hat sich nicht geändert, Vil'Ruoldo. Der Todlose hat Euren Namen geflüstert, und die Umsetzung Seines Willens ist nahe."
languages.original_text: "The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."

traits.locale_text: "Der Plan hat sich nicht geändert, Vil'Ruoldo. Der Todlose hat Euren Namen geflüstert, und die Umsetzung Seines Willens ist nahe."

languages.text: « Le plan n'a pas changé, Vil'Ruoldo. L'Immortel a murmuré votre nom et l'exécution de Sa volonté est proche. »
languages.original_text: "The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."

traits.locale_text: « Le plan n'a pas changé, Vil'Ruoldo. L'Immortel a murmuré votre nom et l'exécution de Sa volonté est proche. »

languages.text: “一切正在按照计划进行，敌者罗尔多。不死之神低声说出了你的名字，祂的旨意即将实现。”
languages.original_text: "The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."

traits.locale_text: “一切正在按照计划进行，敌者罗尔多。不死之神低声说出了你的名字，祂的旨意即将实现。”

languages.text: «El plan no ha cambiado, Vil'Ruoldo. El Inmortal ha susurrado su nombre y la ejecución de Su voluntad está próxima».
languages.original_text: "The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."

traits.locale_text: «El plan no ha cambiado, Vil'Ruoldo. El Inmortal ha susurrado su nombre y la ejecución de Su voluntad está próxima».

languages.text: 「計画は変わってない、ルオルド。不死の者はお前の名を囁いた。あの方のご意志の遂行が間近に迫っている」
languages.original_text: "The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."

traits.locale_text: 「計画は変わってない、ルオルド。不死の者はお前の名を囁いた。あの方のご意志の遂行が間近に迫っている」

languages.text: "Plan değişmedi Vil'Ruoldo. Ölmeyen senin adını fısıldadı ve O'nun iradesinin yerine getirme vakti yaklaştı."
languages.original_text: "The plan has not changed, Vil'Ruoldo. The Undying One has whispered your name, and the execution of His will is nigh."

traits.locale_text: "Plan değişmedi Vil'Ruoldo. Ölmeyen senin adını fısıldadı ve O'nun iradesinin yerine getirme vakti yaklaştı."
